item.title: The Godcast: Popcorn N' Soda: Firefly & Serenity
item.description:
In this episode, I'm joined by the inestimable Gordon Kahl to discuss the new classic series Firefly and the series-concluding movie Serenity. But before we head out into the outer rim, head out to the concession stand and grab yourself some Popcorn N' Soda!

Firefly: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Firefly_(TV_series)

Serenity: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Serenity_(2005_film)

item.title: The Gamer Word on Odysee: The Gamer Word Episode 48- Duckhunting for Manhood
item.description:
While Ruckus is out at the north pole chasing a new elf waifu (he will tell you he was out negotiating with Santa so his kids could get more gifts, don't believe him), Rolo and Bobby are joined by Fashcroft to discuss a controversy of the early 2000s that was designed by corporate america to sell energy drinks and create an epidemic of violence amongst White teens (to offset the fbi statistics) but ultimately failed despite outright lies and extensive lobbying to try and make it seems so. Come for laughs as they dive into this entertaining project and review other amusing things: like the horror movie industry and how the us government tried to finagle what is legally considered torture.

Follow on Telegram: https://t.me/TheGamerWord14

Subscribe via RSS: https://odysee.com/$/rss/@TheGamerWord:d

item.title: The Godcast: The Godcast, Episode 271: Sodomy, a Journey of Discovery (Guest Starring Barack Obama)
item.description:
In this episode, SuperLutheran and Myles follow up our episode on homosexuality and the Biblical world view with a discussion on the real world consequences of sticking things where they don't belong. Former president of the United States, Barack Obama, joins us for the discussion. We go really long answering your emails after the break.

Are Jews the chosen people of God? No: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pzHB5Caglgo

Age of Ruin: From the Ashes: https://poa.st/@Godcast/posts/ALVRT05jJfK3me3PtY

The first of what I hope to be many entries in a science fiction universe both by and for /ourguys/.

item.title: Achtung Amerikaner: The Great Huwite North
item.description:
Gordon gives his thoughts on his travels through the upper Midwest, specifically his time spent in Minnesota and Wisconsin. He takes a gander at several important sites - comparing the "modern art" that is the George Floyd memorial in Minneapolis to the statue of Herman The German in New Ulm, and then his time in Wisconsin, spending a weekend with the boisterous Midwest Network crew in that state before ending on a more somber note about the site of the Waukesha Parade Attack, two years on.

This episode was released early to our generous subscribers. If you would like this kind of early access, as well as other exclusive content, please visit amerikaner.org/donate

Achtung! Amerikaner is proudly hosted on Amerikaner.org and ExodusAmericanus.com

item.title: Achtung Amerikaner: The Magnus Minute - Take That Bet
item.description:
Magnus makes a heartfelt appeal to you, the listener, to make the hard choices, to do what might seem hopeless, to take (proper, reasoned) risks, that will hopefully lead to a brighter future. It is our duty to carry on the healthy traditions of the past, and to not bring unhealthy habits into the future.

This episode was released early for our generous subscribers. If you would like this sort of early access, and other exclusive content, please visit Amerikaner.org/donate

item.title: The Gamer Word on Odysee: The Gamer Word Episode 47- Rockstar Games presents- America is PETA
item.description:
The men come together to give a final review of Robocop: Rogue city before getting into the nitty gritty that is the trailer of Rockstars new game- TND: Florida Man. Where an ambiguous latina (is she high caste, or a squatamalen? Not even the feminist designers of the game can seem to get it locked down between press releases) and her (probably cuck) boyfriend join up to do what they do best: not take any responsibility and blame the White man for all the problems in their lives (probably). Much laughter and discussion to be had about what is likely to become the death knell of a company. Then they discuss smaller games that revolve around divorce, good mafia movies and shows, and whether or not the black Dwarf in the opening cutscene of Return to Moria was just a diversity hire extra.

Follow on Telegram: https://t.me/TheGamerWord14

Subscribe via RSS: https://odysee.com/$/rss/@TheGamerWord:d

item.title: Achtung Amerikaner: The Magnus Minute - On Accountability
item.description:
Magnus returns for another talk, this time about accountability - what it means to be accountable to more than just yourself, or even your close family. Why it is important to keep the company of others who will hold you to a standard, and why you must always strive to achieve, and expect the same from those around you.

This episode was released early to our generous subscribers. If you would like this kind of early access, as well as other exclusive content, please visit Amerikaner.org/Donate

Achtung! Amerikaner is proudly hosted on Amerikaner.org and ExodusAmericanus.com

item.title: Pressure Suit Podcast: John W Campbell's Who Goes There / John Carpenter's The Thing (1982)
item.description:
Gordon and Magnus don their parkas and ready their flamethrowers as they dive into the terrifying isolation and paranoia of John W Campbell's Who Goes There? and the sci-fi/horror cinematic adaptation (or should we say, imitation?) The Thing (1982) by John Carpenter. Primarily known as the colossus of Sci-Fi publishing that brought Speculative Fiction out of the pulp era and mentored some of the great writers of the 20th century, Campbell blends paranoia, isolation, and eldritch terror into a powerful tale of man against...Thing.


Carpenter's 1982 Sci-Fi Horror classic masterfully adapts the story for the silver screen, and combines tight pacing, effortless characterization, and an ensemble cast with Carpenter's signature cinematography, an Ennio Morricone score, and some of the best practical effects of all time.


So grab a bottle of J&B and join us--remember, there are plenty of Imitations, but only ONE Pressure Suit Podcast!
item.dc:creator: Magnus Williams

item.title: Achtung Amerikaner: Midwest News Roundup December 2023
item.description:
Gordon and Grug are back in the saddle, rounding up news stories from all across the Midwestern United States! From millionaires getting poisoned with antifreeze to small Indiana towns getting flooded with libtards, we have all the stories you need to know - and, of course, we cash in Grug's clout chips from our previous episode.

This episode was released early for our generous subscribers. If you'd like this early access, or other exclusive content, please visit Amerikaner.org/donate

Achtung! Amerikaner is proudly hosted on Amerikaner.org and ExodusAmericanus.com

Stories Covered This Episode

  • Illinois: Chicago Suburb Segregates Classrooms To Help Black Students
    • ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​www.zerohedge.com/political/segregated-classrooms-spark-controversy-proponents-criticize-white-standard
  • Indiana: Urbanites Have Found Their Favorite Small City... Indianans, Beware!
    • ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​https://www.foxnews.com/media/indiana-city-dubbed-internets-favorite-small-city-former-urbanites
  • Iowa: Rand Paul Saves Iowa Senator From Choking - Sorry, Iowa
    • ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​https://www.kcci.com/article/joni-ernst-iowa-chokes-at-senate-lunch-saved-by-rand-paul-heimlich-maneuver/46000447
  • Kansas: Students Stage Walk Out To Protest Racist Attack
    • ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​https://www.kansascity.com/news/local/education/article282375233.html
  • Michigan: Michigan State "Deeply Sorry" For Image Of Hitler Shown Before Football Game
    • ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​https://www.nbcnews.com/news/us-news/michigan-state-university-apologizes-hitler-image-displayed-video-boar-rcna121594
  • Minnesota: Black Murderer Of White Minnesota Born Hockey Player Adam Johnson Arrested
    • ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​https://fox59.com/news/national-world/man-arrested-in-death-of-hockey-player-whose-neck-was-cut-with-skate-blade-during-game/
  • Missouri: 3 "Missouri" (AKA Pajeet) Men Arrested For Kidnapping And Enslaving Indian Teenager
    • ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​https://www.riverfronttimes.com/news/3-missouri-men-charged-in-abuse-of-indian-college-student-kept-as-slave-41349767
  • Nebraska: UPDATE - Illegal Immigrant Who Killed Bald Eagle Sentenced
    • ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​www.1011now.com/2023/11/16/man-sentenced-role-killing-bald-eagle-northeast-nebraska/
  • North Dakota:ND Woman Poisons BF With Antifreeze After He Inherits $30M
    • ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​https://breaking911.com/north-dakota-woman-arrested-for-allegedly-killing-boyfriend-with-poison-police-cite-financial-motives/
  • Ohio: Covid 2, Electric Boogaloo - "White Lung" Child Pneumonia Outbreak
    • ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​https://www.newsnationnow.com/health/ohio-child-pneumonia-white-lung-syndrome/
  • South Dakota: Inheritance Dispute Over Sue The Dinosaur
    • ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​www.youtube.com/watch?app=desktop&v=qyVuighW9pU
    • ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​Update On Grand Gateway Hotel "Discrimination" Case www.dakotanewsnow.com/2023/11/10/justice-department-secures-agreement-with-grand-gateway-hotel/
  • Wisconsin: University Of Wisconsin President Says Low Income Students Shouldn't Major In Liberal Arts - In Other News, Sky Blue, Water Wet

item.title: Achtung Amerikaner: The Tribalism Of Ruralite Media
item.description:
Gordon and Magnus go extra long on this episode, talking about the portrayal of western ruralites in popular media, particularly the television series Yellowstone, and how its portrayal of a tribal, tight-knit, and often violent, "pseudo-ethnic" White man is, on its surface, vaguely racial, but at its core reinforces narratives beneficial to an anti-White system.

This episode was released early for our generous subscribers. If you would like this early access, or other exclusive content, please visit Amerikaner.org/Donate

Achtung! Amerikaner is proudly hosted on Amerikaner.org and ExodusAmericanus.com

item.title: Achtung Amerikaner: Transsexuals, Guns, and Derek Chauvin
item.description:
Gordon, Grug, and Magnus go over three different news stories, giving you their white-hot takes and predictions. From Derek Chauvin having his last hope of justice denied, to a deranged anti-Christian pedophilic transsexual threatening heinous acts, and a small town in Michigan declaring itself a sovereign entity where guns are concerned, there's a little something for everyone.

This episode was released early to our generous subscribers. If you would like to recieve this early access, or other exclusive content, please visit Amerikaner.org/Donate

Achtung! Amerikaner is proudly hosted on Amerikaner.org and ExodusAmericanus.com

item.title: The Godcast: Popcorn N' Soda: The Mission (1986)
item.description:
In this episode, SuperLutheran and Myles take a look at the 1986 film The Mission, about a Jesuit mission in South America. The most surprising thing is that the Jesuits aren't the baddies this time around. But before we trek deep into the jungle, head out to the concession stand and grab yourself some Popcorn N' Soda!

Pressure Suit Podcast: Pressure Suit Podcast - Scope and Scale
item.description: In a departure from form, Gordon and Magnus sit down for a long-form general discussion of the problems of mainline Science Fiction settings, including Star Wars, Star Trek, and Warhammer 40k, among others. Scope, Scale, Internal Consistency, and Political propaganda are all examined and critiqued, in between the usual tangents and rabbit trails.

item.title: The Gamer Word on Odysee: The Gamer Word Episode 46- Hobocop: The Coomer, The Zoomer and the Boomer
item.description: The men come together to discuss how Starfield npcs may well be modeled on the (surprisingly and sadly) real life examples that have been shoveled into positions of leadership in once beloved gaming companies (and the political implications of said creatures) with Rolo keeping everyone on the correct page. Bobby admits his shame and guilt in participating in the humiliation ritual that is Spodermin: Nogboy, while Ruckus joins the Japanese in solidarity over the ugly makeover of Princess Peach in the new Mario box art. Bobby redeems himself by sharing all he knows about developments in the AI world and Ruckus shares his initial impressions of the newest game where you get to deal with the problems of Detroit in good old fashioned 80's style of ultra violence and dick shots.

item.title: Achtung Amerikaner: Paradigm Shift
item.description:
A conversation between Gordon and Magnus about a recent article by the jewish "Anti-Woke" Bari Weiss exhorting American Liberals to fight for "civlization" over "barbarism" turns into a broader discussion of recent happenings in the pro-White and anti-Zionist sphere, and what, if anything, this might mean for the future of Zionist control of the United States and the West more broadly.

This episode was released early to our generous subscribers. If you would like this early access, as well as other exclusive content, please visit Amerikaner.org/Donate

item.description: The men come together to discuss the hyper politicization of gaming to the point that old skins in CoD Source maps are being removed due to recent events before tackling the important questions of the day: Is it AI, or the new form of fedposting? Also a quick opening review on The Lords of the Fallen, which Ruckus thinks could/should be an indicator of where the genre of souls-like (though it should be called Bloodborne-like) is headed.

item.title: Achtung Amerikaner: Gordon's Week In Ozarkia
item.description:
Gordon spent a week in the heart of Ozarkia, near Mountain View, Arkansas, a center of traditional folk ways, music, and culture. This episode is a collection of Gordon's thoughts and experiences as he spends an enchanting week in the Natural State, meeting lots of great people and learning a lot about the ways of this quiet part of the American South.

item.title: The Gamer Word on Odysee: The Gamer Word Episode 24- The Alpha Diablo Worde
item.description:
Join the men as they are regaled with the tale of Bobby as he established himself as the Alpha during the beta of what is (hopefully) not a mediocre sequel of one of the most foundational games of the generation. Meanwhile, Ruckus tells tales of a kids version of the game and how his children dragged him back to a game he swore to not play again. Most importantly, a question gets presented: Does booba = magical power?

Follow on Telegram: https://t.me/TheGamerWord14

item.title: The Gamer Word on Odysee: The Gamer Word Episode 23- Furtado Feminism
item.description:
Ruckus and Bobby come together to agree that it is time to smash the patriarchy and play a game with the strongest and most believable female role out there. Even better, she is not oversexualized nor does she fit into any of those tropes that fake games journalists like to complain about.

Listen as they discuss how this character is truly the best strong and independent female you can play a game as and it is truly the most feminist game out there. And be sure to share their ideas for a sequel with the developer: including another strong female role and ensuring that true diversity is shown in the sequel (there were far too many White people in this game to match real life).

Follow on Telegram: https://t.me/TheGamerWord14

item.title: The Gamer Word on Odysee: The Gamer Word Episode 22- Thot Simulator with Goats
item.description:
The men come together to discuss one of the best physics simulator games, and how Twitch went quickly from a gaming community to fake and gay political gatekeeping site. Rolo and Bobby talk in depth about how Destiny became what he is and Ruckus learns to tie a noose while looking at a Twitch thot playing the forbidden game.

Follow on Telegram: https://t.me/TheGamerWord14

item.title: The Gamer Word on Odysee: The Gamer Word Episode 21- Counter Soviet Hornswaggle and other Gobbledegook
item.description:
The men come back from some IRL events to discuss goblin snark, goblin attempts to remove Gamers ability to purchase games, and how a big name company has chosen to focus its money and efforts on finding ways to put Gamers in jail rather than actually make good games (multiple projects, one big one in particular, have failed as they did this). All while discussing how Gamers need to take the reigns of culture and create good games, because even IPs that have established good mechanics and playstyles are being put through the liberal fecal injection process.

Follow on Telegram: https://t.me/TheGamerWord14

item.title: The Gamer Word on Odysee: The Gamer Word Episode 20- Diversity training at Hogwarts
item.description:
It’s been discussed before. This cauldron of trannyisms and controversy has been threatening to bubble over for some time and turn everything into a mashed up Polyjuice potion nightmare.

Join the men as they get their first taste of Hogwarts Legacy and discuss the psychosis of the “former fans”, how you can truly NEVER let “the left” have anything because it is never good enough, how even the trantifa agree with Ruckus that Harry Potter is “problematic” right wing (IE. the House Elf Question), and how in the end, there looks to be plenty to enjoy and have a laugh at, as you race around Hogwarts and pet all the cats (there are so many).

Follow on Telegram: https://t.me/TheGamerWord14

item.title: The Gamer Word on Odysee: The Gamer Word Episode 19- Buffalo Soldier Gaming
item.description:
Bobby and Ruckus are joined by the illustrious Gordon Kahl to discuss Western style games, what makes them good, what could make them great and how the current culture war that we are engaged in needs to be fought on all avenues, all as Gordon threatens to turn the show into an episode of Little Wars.

Follow on Telegram: https://t.me/TheGamerWord14

item.title: The Gamer Word on Odysee: The Gamer Word Episode 18- The original Red Pill
item.description:
We told him he has to stop teasing the fans and now it is finally here. Bobby, Rolo and special guest Magnus come forward to talk about the game that served as the original Red Pill, cleverly disguised as a stealth action rpg.

Follow on Telegram: https://t.me/TheGamerWord14

item.title: The Gamer Word on Odysee: The Gamer Word Episode 17-NogTroon Justice
item.description:
The men gather around for a comfy time discussing the ways that trannies and blacks are given justice in gaming, from wonderful wizarding worlds to interactive horror movie simulators, we all can learn a thing or two as we give our best wishes to Paladin Noggy.

Follow on Telegram: https://t.me/TheGamerWord14

item.title: The Gamer Word on Odysee: The Gamer Word Episode 16- Dork Stranded
item.description:
Nathaniel Socelli joins the men to discuss the first attempt of them Kojimer productions at making a game. Unfortunate complications occur as Rolo and Ruckus actually completely agree on a game, which set off a chain reaction in the chiral network, possibly to try and prevent the ugly truth about this game (which could have been good) from coming to light.

Follow on Telegram: https://t.me/TheGamerWord14

item.title: The Gamer Word on Odysee: The Gamer Word Episode 15- Fever Dreams of a non White Final Fantasy ft. Tranny Potter
item.description:
Ruckus and Bobby (Rolo was out chasing women, showing he is only a casual gamer) discuss the fever dream of where the gaming industry finally corrects the injustices in the upcoming Final Fantasy XVI and where Hogwarts will fly the Tranny flag and Harry Potter will be known as the vanguard of the Tranny supremacist movement.

Follow on Telegram: https://t.me/TheGamerWord14

item.title: The Gamer Word on Odysee: The Gamer Word Episode 14- Kojimer War Crime Simulator
item.description:
The men are joined by Kai as we discuss his “favorite war crime simulator” aka the last game of an amazing series that was abandoned by its parents in favor of trying to make more cinematic things… and pachinko machines. A game where you get to experience how modern day EMTs feel and learn that the way to keep the “demon” at bay is to engage in conservation and save the animals (Unless you wanna be gay and disarm your nukes).

Follow on Telegram: https://t.me/TheGamerWord14

item.title: The Gamer Word on Odysee: The Gamer Word Episode 13- Cyber Krunk 2070
item.description:
We are joined by Magnus to discuss the “Best worst game of 2020”: What was, what could have been, and what has been denigrated as “Tranny simulator 2077” ultimately did not even serve in that purpose, despite the eerie predictions of the Prophet Sam Hyde (peace be upon him) coming more and more true.

So regardless of which brown girl you end up romancing, remember the most important thing is whether or not you chose Penis 1.

Follow on Telegram: https://t.me/TheGamerWord14

item.title: The Gamer Word on Odysee: The Gamer Word Episode 12- Space Confederate Appreciation Hour
item.description:
This week we have on the incredibly handsome Amerikaner Man himself (taking a break from his harem of Culvers waitresses and big tiddy goth farm girls) to discuss his appreciation of the game about Space Confederacy and the original monster girl that was so genre defining that it established Korea as a world power.

Follow on Telegram: https://t.me/TheGamerWord14

item.title: The Gamer Word on Odysee: The Gamer Word Episode 11- Komfy gaming and LoLCow soyciety
item.description:
The men discuss games they have been playing, how Bethesda being friendly to modders has extended the shelf life of their games by a ton, and then the guys do their best to give your second favorite uncle depression by pointing out the existence and apparent profitability of LoLCows.

Follow on Telegram: https://t.me/TheGamerWord14

item.title: The Gamer Word on Odysee: The Gamer Word Episode 10- Swole Dorks of Jolly Cooperation
item.description:
Ruckus and Bobby are joined by a couple Sun Bros to discuss the game series that taught them to never give up, that it is important to always fight and move forwards even in the face of overwhelming despair, what is really between a thots legs, and how simping is only ever acceptable to save your bros. Only through this heroic struggle, with and for your bros, do you learn what it means to Git Gud.

Subscribe via RSS: https://audio.nobodyhasthe.biz/api/v1/channels/thegamerword/rss

item.title: The Gamer Word on Odysee: The Gamer Word Episode 9- Spodermin and Noggerboy
item.description:
The men discuss one of the last good things to come out of Marvel, and remind everyone that Marvel not only butchers their villains to absolute crap, but already has worse in store for the future already established. But at least fantasy New York is far better than real New York (give you one guess as to (((why))) that is).

Follow on Telegram: https://t.me/TheGamerWord14

item.title: The Gamer Word on Odysee: The Gamer Word Episode 8- Metal Gear Booty- Cheesecake Waifu
item.description:
Myles Poland joins the men to discuss how Hideo Kojima is actually just a tool of the AI overlords who seek to ruin NNN by creating the ultimate waifu.

Follow on Telegram: https://t.me/TheGamerWord14

item.title: The Gamer Word on Odysee: The Gamer Word Episode 7- Liberal Bingo- G4 you lose
item.description:
The men remark and reminisce about how good things could get started with allegedly hot hostesses and then quickly turn into a cesspit of anti-Gamer ideology that ultimately flops because the goblins that want to destroy gaming do not care about money as much as they do ruining good things. As a bonus: any network execs can listen to the show and get ideas for actually good and popular shows and characters.

Follow on Telegram: https://t.me/TheGamerWord14

item.title: The Gamer Word on Odysee: The Gamer Word Episode 6- Legacy of Bacala- a 5 minute character review
item.description:
Special guest Nathaniel Socelli comes aboard to discuss one of the best storytelling games of our generation. All this with only watching 5 minutes of a character review video even. Nostalgia abounds as we revisit the land of Nosgoth to review the start of serious storytelling becoming a major part of gaming.

Follow on Telegram: https://t.me/TheGamerWord14

item.title: The Gamer Word on Odysee: The Gamer Word Episode5-Alex Jones presents Bigger Neater in Chicago!
item.description:
Join the men as they discuss a game that started out kinda problematic but was fixed in future installments until it became the Antifa simulator everyone wanted. Learn how gameplay doesn’t matter when the game is used to push a problematic agenda. Also bonus info about the beautiful country of India and it’s wonderful people.

Follow on Telegram: https://t.me/TheGamerWord14

item.title: The Gamer Word on Odysee: The Gamer Word Episode 4- Radikal Gaming
item.description:
The men discuss how radicalism is being spread through gaming and the strategies on how to combat the blatant antisemitism and white supremacy inherent in the culture. Also hear about the amazing corporate practices that are moving gaming forward in this new age, and tips on how you too can be a 14 yr old fed.

Follow on Telegram: https://t.me/TheGamerWord14
